isis.stitle: POWER STEERING GEAR: SHEPPARD M-SERIES - ADJUSTMENTS

svcproc.title: FINAL
svcproc.para: The Sheppard M-Series power steering gear has no external adjustments. It is important to check and adjust other components in the system when necessary.
It will be necessary to set the relief plungers in each end of the steering gear. Refer to SET RELIEF PLUNGERS.
Finally, if the steering gear has been changed, it may be necessary to center the steering wheel. Refer to GROUP 02 - FRONT AXLE in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual for the proper procedure.

caution.para: Never center the steering wheel by re-indexing splines on the steering column slip shaft. This will take the column out of phase and cause lumpy steering.
